exclusion: Enter the Exclusion Mode of gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the PIR sensor will be removed after a period of time.
inclusion: Enter the Inclusion Mode of gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the PIR sensor will stay in enrollment state until successfully enrolled into network or enrollment time out after 30s.
label: DP-32 / IX-30 / IX-32
overview: The hardware board for the IX30 (wall) and IX32 (ceiling) is the same thing and reports the same Type and ID.
wakeup: Quickly press tamper switch once, the PIR sensor will automatically send wake-up information, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information.

parameters.label: Basic Set
parameters.overview: If there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to control that deivce when the PIR is triggered.

parameters.label: Turn Off Light Time Configuration
parameters.overview: If there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to Group 2 and send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light after 5 x t seconds- Set value t means to send the BAsic Set command after t seconds.

parameters.label: PIR Sensor Alarm Elimination Time Configuration
parameters.description: PIR Sensor Alarm Elimination Time Configuration
parameters.overview:
Min time is 5s. Eg If the config is 1, this means it will eliminate alarm after 1 * 5s = 5 seconds

The selected value is multiplied with 5. After this time the sensor will report PIR OFF.

E.g. If you select value --> 3 * 5s = 15 seconds.

The Sensor will report PIR Off after 15 seconds.

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Send "notification_Report" to the device in Life line group

associations.label: Basic Set Command
associations.overview:
When sensor is triggered:

[Command Class BAsic, Basic Set, Value = 0xFF(default 0xFF, configurable, see Config Parameters)

 

When light up timeout:

[Command Class BAsic, BAsic Set, Value =0x00]
